Toni&Guy Conditioner for Fine Hair (250 ml) Price: Rs.700

Key Features

  • Nourishes Hair Fibre to Strengthen
  • Maintains Lift for Full Bodied Volume
  • For Weightless Volume
  • Non-greasy

Fine and soft hair may always look sleek and perfect but even those people love the high waves and a little volume can now help flaunt brilliant hairdos thanks to this Conditioner for Fine Hair from Toni&Guy. Any amount of heavy residue in the form of moisture can leave fine hair more limp and flat but this conditioner promises rich conditioning without the weight that is framed with rich moisture.

Each hair fibre is softened and strengthened and from the roots the conditioner adds lift and body volume to support all fad hairstyles to ice a dazzling ensemble. T&G creates a non greasy formula

making sure the conditioner is not too thick to be rinsed off with an easy and quick shower.
